data.message: Is there a way to not allow friends to share your photos and videos? I thought I had mine only be allowed to be seen by friends but I have people share my stuff and then people I have no idea why they are can comment on my things...Thanks!

replies.message: Hi Lindsay. There are several things you can do to keep friends from sharing your photos and videos. You'll find an audience selector tool most places you share status updates, photos and other things you post. Click the tool and select who you want to share something with. To learn more about the audience selector tool and audience settings from our Help Center, click here: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/120939471321735. - Sarah
